name: Create a new Knack record from a submitted Cognito Forms entry
description:
Every time a new Cognito Forms entry is submitted, Make will automatically create a new record in Knack.

The template uses this [form](https://www.cognitoforms.com/DanielB1/TestForm) and a Knack object with the following fields: First name, Last name, Email, Phone, Company and Website.
